SIMplyBee - overview of functions for consolidation

2022-08-17

Source: vignettes/SIMplyBee.Rmd
SIMplyBee.Rmd

L0 functions

nColonies; input colonies; return n

nCaste; input Colony or MultiColony; return n nQueen nVirginQueens nFathers nWorkers nDrones nHomDrones

isQueenMated; input Pop, Colony, or MultiColony; return logical

getQueensYearOfBirth & getQueensYOB; input Pop, Colony or MultiColony; return numeric getQueensAge

getId; input Colony or MultiColony; return character or list of characters getCasteId; input Pop, Colony or MultiColony; return character or list of characters getLocation; input Colony or v; return numeric or list of numeric

hasSplit; input Colony or MultiColony; return logical hasSwarmed hasSuperseded isProductive getEvents

SimParamBee simulateHoneyBeeGenomes TODO

getCsdHaplo; input Pop, Colony or MultiColony; return matrix, list of matrix, list of a list of matrix getCsdGeno

getIbdHaplo; input Pop; return matrix getQtlHaplo getQtlGeno getSegSiteHaplo getSegSiteGeno getSnpHaplo getSnpGeno

getCasteIbdHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensIbdHaplo getFathersIbdHaplo getVirginQueensIbdHaplo getWorkersIbdHaplo getDronesIbdHaplo getColonyIbdHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteQtlHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensQtlHaplo getFathersQtlHaplo getVirginQueensQtlHaplo getWorkersQtlHaplo getDronesQtlHaplo getColonyQtlHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteQtlGeno; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensQtlGeno getFathersQtlGeno getVirginQueensQtlGeno getWorkersQtlGeno getDronesQtlGeno getColonyQtlGeno; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteSegSiteHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensSegSiteHaplo getFathersSegSiteHaplo getVirginQueensSegSiteHaplo getWorkersSegSiteHaplo getDronesSegSiteHaplo getColonySegSiteHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteSegSiteGeno; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensSegSiteGeno getFathersSegSiteGeno getVirginQueensSegSiteGeno getWorkersSegSiteGeno getDronesSegSiteGeno getColonySegSiteGeno; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteSnpHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensSnpHaplo getFathersSnpHaplo getVirginQueensSnpHaplo getWorkersSnpHaplo getDronesSnpHaplo getColonySnpHaplo; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteSnpGeno; input Colony or MultiColony; return matrix or list of matrix getQueensSnpGeno getFathersSnpGeno getVirginQueensSnpGeno getWorkersSnpGeno getDronesSnpGeno getColonySnpGeno; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of matrix or list of a list of matrix

getCasteGv; input Colony or MultiColony; return vector or list of vector getQueensGv getFathersGv getVirginQueensGv getWorkersGv getDronesGv getColonyGv; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of vector or list of a list of vector

getCasteBv; input Colony or MultiColony; return vector or list of vector getQueensBv getFathersBv getVirginQueensBv getWorkersBv getDronesBv getColonyBv; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of vector or list of a list of vector

getCasteDd; input Colony or MultiColony; return vector or list of vector getQueensDd getFathersDd getVirginQueensDd getWorkersDd getDronesDd getColonyDd; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of vector or list of a list of vector

L1 functions

getCaste; input Colony or MultiColony; return Pop getQueen getFathers getVirginQueens getWorkers getDrones

createWorkers; input Colony; return Pop; TODO work also with MultiColony? createDrones createVirginQueens

createDCA; input Colony or MultiColony; return Pop

pullInd; input Pop; return list of 2 Pop

pullDroneGroupsFromDCA; input Pop; list of n Pop; TODO rename to pullIndGroups?

pullCaste; input Colony or MultiColony; return list of Pop and Colony pullQueen pullVirginQueens pullWorkers pullDrones

crossVirginQueen; input 2 Pop; return Pop

setLocation; input Colony or MultiColony; return Colony or MultiColony

setQueensYearOfBirth & setQueensYOB; input Pop, Colony, or MultiColony; return Pop, Colony, or MultiColony

L2 functions

createColony; input Pop; return Colony

reQueenColony; TODO rename to replaceQueen() to be consistent with other replace functions? Or should this be called setQueen() and it can then serve as a way to set a queen for the new colony as well as to set a new queen that replaces the old one? This function could then also set colony id so we don’t need to take care of that.

addVirginQueens; TODO add external virgin queens instead of just generating them from the hive?

addWorkers; input Colony, return Colony; TODO some have Colony in name, some don’t!? addDrones buildUpColony; TODO use replace* and add* arguments? rename to buildUp()? replaceWorkers replaceDrones removeQueen removeVirginQueen removeWorkers removeDrones resetEvents crossColony; TODO rename to cross()? there are many cross() in R, so this won’t work collapseColony; TODO rename to collapse()? supersedeColony; TODO rename to supersede()? setPhenoColony; TODO rename to setColonyPheno()?

swarmColony; input Colony, return list of 2 Colony; TODO rename to swarm()? splitColony; TODO rename to split() (clash with other R func(s))?

L3 functions

createMultiColony; input n or Pop; return MultiColony; TODO how is this different to createColony?

addColonyToTheColonies; REMOVE input Colones and Colony; return Colonies; TODO rename to addColony() or just add()? assignColonyToColonies; TODO rename to assignColony() or just assign()?

selectColonies; input Colonies; return Colonies removeColonies

pullColonies; input Colonies; return list of 2 Colonies

buildUpColonies; input Colonies; return Colonies; TODO rename to buildUp()? replaceWorkersColonies; TODO merge with replaceWorkers()? replaceDronesColonies; TODO merge with replaceDrones()? reQueenColonies; TODO merge with replaceQueen()? collapseColonies; TODO merge with collapse()? supersedeColonies; TODO merge with supersede()?

swarmColonies; input Colonies; return list of 2 Colonies; TODO merge with swarm()? splitColonies; TODO merge with split() (clash with other R func(s))?

crossColonies; input Colonies; return Colonies; TODO merge with cross()? there is many cross() in R, so this won’t work setPhenoColonies; TODO merge with setColonyPheno?
